title: Smart feasibility optimization of hybrid renewable water supply systems by digital twin technologies: A multicriteria approach applied to isolated cities

Source: Sustainable Cities and Society, Volume 115

Author(s): Miguel Tavares, Modesto Pérez-Sánchez, Armando Carravetta, Oscar E. Coronado-Hernández, P. Amparo López-Jiménez, Helena M. Ramos
